thread.title: Tune into the largest K-5 streaming concert ever
thread.title_full: Tune into the largest K-5 streaming concert ever

title: Tune into the largest K-5 streaming concert ever
text:
30 Tune into the largest K-5 streaming concert ever 
eSchool News: To cap off Connected Educator Month, classroom entertainer Dave Ruch is hosting what he hopes will become the biggest K-5 singalong ever — hosting a free, streaming concert Oct. 30 for schools around the world.For the past 20 years, Ruch has been a veritable classroom troubadour, leading small concerts on topics that connect directly to curriculum — like a westward expansion singalong using 19th century tunes. But for the October event, he’s just focused on getting “classrooms together from all over the place and have a good time,” he said.
